org.elasticsearch.common.geo.builders

Class PointCollection<E extends PointCollection<E>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.elasticsearch.common.geo.builders.ShapeBuilder
      • org.elasticsearch.common.geo.builders.PointCollection<E>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ToXContent
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BaseLineStringBuilder, MultiPointBuilder

    public abstract class PointCollection<E extends PointCollection<E>>
extends ShapeBuilder
    The PointCollection is an abstract base implementation for all GeoShapes. It simply handles a set of points.

      • coordinatesToXcontent

        protected XContentBuilder coordinatesToXcontent(XContentBuilder builder,
                                    boolean closed)
                                         throws IOException
        builds an array of coordinates to a XContentBuilder
        Parameters:
        builder - builder to use
        closed - repeat the first point at the end of the array if it's not already defines as last element of the array
        Returns:
        the builder
        Throws:
        IOException
